description: The contractor will work with the Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) to implement the GPHIN Next Generation Project.
full_summary:
# Global Public Health Intelligence Network (GPHIN) Next Generation Project

### Project Overview
The Government of Canada invites you to participate in the solicitation for the Global Public Health Intelligence Network (GPHIN) Next Generation Project. This project aims to enhance Canada's event-based surveillance (EBS) system and early-warning mechanism for detecting potential public health threats worldwide.

### Solicitation Details
The solicitation details are as follows:

* Solicitation Number: WS4065073763
* Publication Date: June 22, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: August 2, 2023, at 2:00 PM (ET)
* Amendment Number: 2
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: January 1, 2024

### Contract Specifications
The successful bidder will be required to provide:

* Procedure management software
* Analytical or scientific software

### Contracting Information
The contracting entity for this project is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC). The project will be delivered at the National Capital Region (NCR).

### Trade Agreements
This solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Contact Information
For any questions or concerns, please contact Pascal Plouffe at pascal.plouffe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Access to Solicitation Documents
The solicitation documents can be accessed at: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16662570. ... (cont.)
